label: faxCommunication
comment: Facsimile communication information for this contact person.
Fax communication information for this location party.
Fax communication information for this trade contact.
The fax number of this laboratory observation contact.

rangeIncludes.comment: The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.

domainIncludes.comment: An individual human being in a position to give assistance or information.
A person or department that acts as a point of contact for laboratory observations.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role related to a location.
A person or a department that acts as a point of contact with another person or department in a trading relationship.
